text: Santa Croce sull'Arno is an Italian town in the province of Pisa, Tuscany. About 13,400 people lived there as of 2005. == Industry == The city is famous for the tanning industries. In 16.92 square kilometres there are about 400 factories and laboratories. == References == ==Other websites== Category:Towns in the Province of Pisa
title: Santa Croce sull'Arno
